import React from "react" import {Input,CreateField,TextArea,TextAreaAboutMe} from "../../assetss/common/ValidatorsComponents/ElementsValidators"; import pc from './UserInfo.module.css' import {MaxLengthCreator} from "../../utils/validators"; const ProfileDataEditorForm = (props) => { return
My name is : {CreateField("Enter your full name","fullName",[],Input)}
are u looking for a job? : {/*
*/} {CreateField("","lookingForAJob",[],"select",{type : "checkbox"})}
My professional skills: {CreateField("Enter description","lookingForAJobDescription",[],TextAreaAboutMe)}
about me: {CreateField("print something about you","aboutMe",[],TextAreaAboutMe)}
{props.error ?
{props.error}
: null}
} export default ProfileDataEditorForm
